definition: ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Leon Trotsky was assassinated near Mexico City.
sentences.chinese: 托洛斯基在墨西哥城附近遇刺。

sentences.english: Traffic encircles the Angel of Independence monument on Mexico City’s Paseo de la Reforma.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥城改革大道，車輛環繞獨立天使紀念碑行駛。

sentences.english: I read only La Prensa which comes from Mexico City.
sentences.chinese: 我只看從墨西哥城來的《新聞報》。

sentences.english: Which of the following has caused parts of Mexico City to sink?
sentences.chinese: 下列哪個原因已經造成墨西哥城部分地區的下陷？

sentences.english: Have you ever been to Mexico City and haggled with the locals over souvenirs?
sentences.chinese: 你有沒有到墨西哥城與當地人討價還價過旅遊紀念品？

sentences.english: About once in ten years snow falls on Mexico City.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥城大約每隔十年降一次雪。

sentences.english: But that was before Mexico City.
sentences.chinese: 但那是在墨西哥城之前的事。

sentences.english: The infected farmworker had recently returned from Mexico and has since recovered.
sentences.chinese: 受感染的農場工人近日已從墨西哥城返回並已經康復。

sentences.english: Aramark's first Olympics was Mexico City in 1968.
sentences.chinese: 愛瑪客首次參與奧運會是在1968年的墨西哥城。

sentences.english: Barragan died in Mexico City in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 貝若根於1988年在墨西哥城去世。

sentences.english: Consider the problems of water supply in Mexico City or Delhi.
sentences.chinese: 考慮一下墨西哥城或德里的水供應問題。

sentences.english: Mexico City is mulling visa-free access for Chinese visitors.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥城正醞釀對中國遊客開放入境免籤。

sentences.english: Mexico City, Moscow and Cape Town are slated for restaurant openings this spring.
sentences.chinese: 今年春天將在墨西哥城，莫斯科和開普敦開設新餐館。

sentences.english: The seventeenth International AIDS Conference took place in Mexico City in August.
sentences.chinese: 第十七屆國際艾滋病大會於8月在墨西哥城舉行。

sentences.english: Austin was put in prison in Mexico City for a year and a half.
sentences.chinese: 奧斯丁被投進了墨西哥城的監獄，他被關了一年半。

sentences.english: The fighting lasted one week. The government of Mexico surrendered.
sentences.chinese: 進攻墨西哥城的戰鬥持續了一週，墨西哥政府投降了。

definition: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania/abbr. for 費拉德爾菲亞|费拉德尔菲亚[Fei4 la1 de2 er3 fei1 ya4]
Salt Lake City, capital of Utah
Santiago, capital of Chile/San Diego, California
La Paz, administrative capital of Bolivia
St Louis, large city in eastern Missouri
